member.name: M:ArrayExt.ArrayEx.ToUpper(System.Char[])
member.summary: Converts the specified character array to upper case.

member.name: M:ArrayExt.ArrayEx.ToLower(System.Char[])
member.summary: Converts the specified character array to lower case.

member.name: M:ArrayExt.ArrayEx.Insert(System.Int32[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Inserts an integer into the array at a specified index.
member.param: array to insert the data byte

member.name: M:ArrayExt.ArrayEx.Insert(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Byte)
member.summary: Inserts a byte into the existing array at a specified index.

member.name: M:ArrayExt.ArrayEx.Insert(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Byte[])

member.name: M:ArrayExt.ArrayEx.Insert(System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Char)

member.name: M:ArrayExt.ArrayEx.Insert(System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Char[])

member.name: M:ArrayExt.ArrayEx.Insert(System.Char[],System.Int32,System.String)
